name: Paradiso Guardian (itch)
description:
Paradiso Guardian is an ActionRPG game heavily influenced by the Castlevania series,
that also contains visual novel elements.

Nyroro and me are developing this game! 
Featuring pixel-art for in-game sprites and hi-res illustrations for dialog sprites and CG scenes.
This game will have 2 versions, in SFW, and NSFW versions.

To be noted that the NSFW version contains homosexual contents.

Current release is a SFW public version that don't contain sexual contents.
